page.title: 02BRIGG RAILWAY STATION
page.content: The population of Brigg is 5,lOO but it is not very well served by its Railway {Station}. The station is run down with no toilets, booking office, nor waiting rooms and is situated on the {Cleethorpes - Sheffield}line via Gainsborough. Although only 4OO metres from the town centre very few passengers use this facility. Therefore the train service has been reduced to six a day (three in either direction). The {trains} we surveyed had an average of nine passengers (including the driver). We discovered that the journey {time} from Brigg to Sheffield was one hour twenty-six minutes and Brigg to Cleethorpes was just thirty-seven minutes.
